content: व्यंग्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Indicated by implication, indicated by covert or indirect allusion. {@--2@} Suggested (as sense). --ग्यं Suggested sense, insinuation, the meaning hinted at (<ab>opp.</ab> वाच्य ‘the primary or expressed meaning’, and लक्ष्य ‘the secondary or indicated meaning’); इदमुत्तममतिशयिनि व्यंग्ये वाच्याद् ध्वनिर्बुधैः कथितः <ls>K. P. 1.</ls>
